channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Liberty for Java for Bluemix
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Liberty for Java for Bluemix

item.title: CVE-2017-1681|2024-08-05T13:39:32.371Z -- ibm -- liberty%20for%20java%20for%20bluemix
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server (IBM Liberty for Java for Bluemix 3.15) could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper handling of application requests, which could allow unauthorized access to read a file. IBM X-Force ID: 134003.

item.title: CVE-2017-1583|2024-08-05T13:39:31.874Z -- ibm -- liberty%20for%20java%20for%20bluemix
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server (IBM Liberty for Java for Bluemix 3.13)could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information caused by improper error handling by MyFaces in JSF.
